EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: The Insider's Guide to Mobile Apps 1/7
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering for our upcoming webinar "The Insider's Guide to Mobile Apps" on Wednesday, January, 2015 at 10:00 AM PST. Please see the event details below:
Date: Wednesday, January 7, 2015 Time: 10:00AM PST (San Francisco) Event Number: 669 755 545 Join the Session <http://w.on24.com/r.htm?e=910773&s=1&k=AFFBE6BBB898B59DF2B8A6397D09EFCB> Audio Information: This webinar will be streaming live via audio bridge
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us, The Pivotal Team
